snippet: Before they can sit down to watch the Super Bowl on Sunday, the Rangers will face the rival Philadelphia Flyers at Madison Square Garden.
abstract: New York Rangers will face the Philadelphia Flyers before they can get together to watch the Super Bowl.
lead_paragraph: Before they can sit down to watch the Super Bowl on Sunday, the Rangers will face the rival Philadelphia Flyers at Madison Square Garden.

headline.seo: Rangers’ Super Sunday Kicks Off With a Game Against Archrival Flyers
headline.main: Rangers’ Super Sunday Will Kick Off With a Game Before That Other Game
headline.print_headline: Rangers’ Super Sunday Will Kick Off With a Game Before That Other Game
